Subject: Reminder: AWS account 097681509660 will be permanently closed in 15 days
Description:
Hi Team,

We have been continuously receiving notifications regarding the impending closure of the AWS account associated with Account ID 097681509660. The account is scheduled to be permanently closed within 15 days. After this period, the account cannot be reopened, and all remaining content will be permanently deleted.

Note: Could you please investigate the reason behind this alert? Kindly check on your end and provide me with an update."
What_We_Know__c:
30.04
- reached out to Oana Nemes to check the account
- informed the customer success team via email

02.05
- forwarded the question to the devops team as per customer success' request
- the devops team said the following:
The customer, Tech Wave Consulting India, has their instance hosted by Netwrix AWS.
Their server, https://ew2l29w.hosted.endpointprotector.com, is up-and-running and there is no way to be affected by the AWS account (097681509660) owned by them.
Next_Steps__c:
30.04
- waiting on the customer success

02.05
- waiting on the customer to close the ticket
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer, Tech Wave Consulting India, has their instance hosted by Netwrix AWS.
Their server, https://ew2l29w.hosted.endpointprotector.com, is up-and-running and there is no way to be affected by the AWS account (097681509660) owned by them
